org.activebpel.rt.bpel.def.io.readers.def
Interface IAeCopyOperationStrategyMatcher

All Known Implementing Classes:
AeCommonSpecStrategyMatcher
public interface IAeCopyOperationStrategyMatcher

implements the matching logic for determining the strategy to use for a or def in a copy operation

Method Summary

          Gets the strategy to use for the from def

          Gets the strategy to use for the to def
